data.Description: A wandering soul, exploring the unknown reaches of the world in search of treasure and the thrill of discovery.
A brute of a man, relying on strength and brawn rather than wit and cunning as he sought out treasure and glory in the far-flung corners of the world.
A sly thief, using stealth and deception to pilfer valuable goods and riches from those foolish enough to underestimate her.
A devout cultist, seeking out forbidden knowledge and ancient relics in the hopes of summoning powerful deities and unlocking the secrets of the universe.
The warrior is a fierce and agile fighter, their feline features giving them a deadly grace and speed in battle as they prowled through the battlefield.
